p: To compute FI ∞, we solve Eqs (3)– (10) with N + a = 10 4 individuals, a = 1. Each simulation is allowed to run for (0, T), where time T is large enough to ensure that the epidemic has died out. In particular, T is chosen to be large enough for each considered epidemic pair so that R( T) ≈ R(∞) obtained from the simulation satisfies Eq (15) with some error ϵ < 10 −2. The recovery rate used was γ = 1/3 day −1 [ 13].
